document.full_text: of the four teams left in these stanley cup playoffs, three have survived near-disastrous collapses. does that make tampa bay the favorite? hard to say.
document.title: may madness in n.h.l. playoffs: collapse and advance
lines_and_colors: of the four teams left in these stanley cup playoffs, three have survived near-disastrous collapses. does that make tampa bay the favorite? hard to say.
